name: 6 Chambers (GMTK Jam 2022 Submission)
description:
6 chambers was created for GMTK Jam 2022:

Theme: Roll of the Dice

It's Russian Roulette, with a small twist: you get a hint!

Test your luck! The revolver has 6 chambers. 3 are empty, 2 are duds, and 1 is loaded with a deadly bullet. Once you find a dud, use the hint to find the second one. The rest is up to fate!

Win the game by firing all 3 empties, and both duds. But don't shoot the bullet!
